name: Push Blox 2
description:
Challenging block-pushing puzzle game, where the aim is to connect together all blocks of the same color. Navigate locks, conveyors, lasers, and other obstacles, amid fiendishly designed levels and contraptions. 75% completion will hand you victory; complete the game in its entirety to join the Hall of Push Blox Masters.

Features:

- Hand-made puzzles
- Gradually increasing difficulty from simple to deep
- A relaxing, original guitar soundtrack
- Sleek, minimalist interface
